item.title: 美国防务公司追逐欧洲军费浪潮
item.description: 美国国防巨头在华盛顿强大的国会代表团的支持下，利用巴黎航展展示尖端技术，并向欧洲合作伙伴抛出橄榄枝，以寻求获得不断增长的地区军事开支。【原文：U.S. defence giants, backed by a strong Congressional delegation from Washington, used the Paris Airshow to showcase cutting-edge technologies and court European partners as they seek to tap into rising regional military spending.】

item.title: 空中客车公司乐观，但可能需要等待亚航的交易
item.description: 周三，经常在最后一刻上演交易大戏的廉价航空公司亚航（AirAsia）的老板淡化了与空客或巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）达成飞机交易的预期，这场全球最大的航展似乎将以平淡收场。【原文：The world's biggest air show looked set on Wednesday for a muted finale after the owner of budget carrier AirAsia, often a source of last-minute dealmaking drama, played down the prospect of expected plane deals with Airbus or Embraer .】

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储会议召开，油价再次下跌
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 官员称马来西亚将增加 50%的天然气发电能力以满足数据中心需求
item.description: 一位行业官员表示，马来西亚预计到 2030 年将增加 6-8 千兆瓦的燃气发电，以应对数据中心需求带动的电力消费增长。【原文：Malaysia is expected to add 6-8 gigawatts of gas-fired power by 2030 to address growing electricity consumption driven by demand from data centres, an industry official said.】

item.title: 提前提名美联储主席可能令市场恐慌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将很快提名杰罗姆-鲍威尔的继任者，距离美联储主席的任期结束还有近一年的时间。投资者表示，这可能会给市场带来风险。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump has said that he would soon nominate Jerome Powell's successor, with nearly a year left before the Federal Reserve chair's term ends. Investors said that could present a risky proposition for markets.】

item.title: 美联储利率决议前华尔街期货持稳
item.description: 周三，在美联储做出货币政策决定之前，美国股指期货走高，而以色列与伊朗的冲突已进入第六天，双方都发动了新的导弹袭击。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Wednesday ahead of the Federal Reserve's monetary policy decision, while the Israel-Iran conflict entered its sixth day, with new missile strikes launched from both sides.】

item.title: 美联储将维持利率稳定，中东危机和关税给前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 预计美联储将在周三维持利率不变，因为其决策者正在评估经济降温的迹象，以及美国进口关税和中东危机升级带来的通胀上升风险。【原文：The Federal Reserve is expected to keep interest rates unchanged on Wednesday as its policymakers assess signs of a cooling economy and the risk of higher inflation from U.S. import tariffs and the escalating crisis in the Middle East.】

item.title: 清洁能源在特朗普的美国拥有拥趸，使预算谈判复杂化
item.description: 在犹他州盐湖城郊区克利菲尔德的一栋工业厂房里，美国制造的长条钢材被送入机器，经过穿刺、弯曲和切割，变成了不久将固定在屋顶上的太阳能电池板的棒材。【原文：In an industrial building in the Salt Lake City suburb of Clearfield, Utah, long strips of U.S.-made steel were fed through machines that punctured, bent and cut them into rods that will soon hold solar panels on rooftops.】

item.title: 新加坡贷款机构星展银行的目标是在 5 年内将澳大利亚的贷款额翻一番
item.description: 星展集团首席执行官陈苏山（Tan Su Shan）表示，星展集团的目标是在未来五年内将其在澳大利亚的贷款额翻一番，这家总部位于新加坡的银行正努力利用澳大利亚与东南亚之间的贸易联系。【原文：DBS Group aims to double its Australian lending book in the next five years, its CEO Tan Su Shan said, as the Singapore-headquartered bank seeks to take advantage of trade links between Australia and Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 美联储官员在长期通胀前景不明朗的情况下召开会议
item.description: 美联储官员在讨论如何正确制定货币政策时面临诸多不确定性，其中最棘手的问题之一就是如何预测通货膨胀的走向，尤其是长期走向。【原文：Among the uncertainties facing Federal Reserve officials as they debate the proper setting of monetary policy, one of the trickiest has been divining where inflation is going, especially over the longer run.】

item.title: 马来西亚贸易部调查有关中国公司使用英伟达人工智能芯片的报道
item.description: 马来西亚贸易部周三表示，该部正在核实媒体关于该国一家中国公司使用配备英伟达（Nvidia）和人工智能芯片的服务器进行大型语言模型训练的报道。【原文：Malaysia's trade ministry is verifying media reports that a Chinese company in the country is using servers equipped with Nvidia and artificial intelligence chips for large language models training, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 汇丰任命亚洲资深人士 Christopher Chua 为全球并购主管
item.description: 欧洲最大的银行汇丰银行周三任命克里斯托弗-蔡（Christopher Chua）为并购业务主管，汇丰银行前全球主管上月离职后转投摩根大通。【原文：Europe's biggest bank HSBC appointed Christopher Chua head of mergers and acquisitions on Wednesday, after its former global head left for JPMorgan last month.】

item.title: 乘车服务公司 Careem 将暂停已有十年历史的巴基斯坦服务
item.description: 优步（Uber）在中东的打车服务分支 Careem 将于 7 月 18 日暂停其在巴基斯坦的服务，理由是经济挑战、竞争加剧和资金紧张。【原文：Careem, Uber's ride-hailing arm in the Middle East, will suspend its Pakistan service on July 18, citing economic challenges, rising competition, and capital constraints, ending its core business in a country where it helped pioneer app-based transport nearly a decade ago.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦 PIA 的出售在截止日期前吸引了知名企业和军队公司的兴趣
item.description: 巴基斯坦两家领先的商业集团和一家由强大军方支持的公司将竞购该国濒临破产的国家航空公司，政府希望这一撤资行动将启动国有企业的私有化进程。【原文：Two of Pakistan's leading business groups and a company backed by the powerful military will bid for the country's ailing national carrier, a divestment the government hopes will kickstart the privatisations of state-owned enterprises.】

item.title: 瑞银报告供应商遭网络攻击后数据泄露，客户数据未受影响
item.description: 瑞士银行瑞银（UBS）周三表示，由于其一家供应商遭到网络攻击，导致数据泄露，但没有客户数据受到影响。【原文：Swiss bank UBS on Wednesday said it had suffered a data leak due to a cyber attack against one of its providers, but that no client data was affected.】

item.title: 印尼反垄断机构 "有条件 "批准 TikTok 收购 Tokopedia
item.description: 印度尼西亚反垄断机构周三表示，在结束对潜在垄断风险的调查后，该机构 "有条件 "地批准了 TikTok 去年对该国最大电子商务平台 Tokopedia 的收购。【原文：Indonesia's antitrust agency has given its "conditional" blessing to last year's takeover of the country's biggest e-commerce platform Tokopedia by TikTok after ending its probe into potential monopoly risks, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 普华永道称：私募股权基金坐拥 1 万亿美元资金，面临不确定性，并购停滞不前
item.description: 普华永道会计师事务所（PwC）周三表示，私募股权公司持有约 1 万亿美元的未出售资产--在一般市场环境下，这些资金本应返还给投资者。【原文：Private equity firms are holding about $1 trillion in unsold assets, PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) said on Wednesday — capital that, in a typical market environment, would have been returned to investors.】

item.title: 瑞银报告称，美国去年每天新增 1000 多位百万富翁
item.description: 周三公布的一份报告显示，去年美国财富增长过快，超过 37.9 万人成为新的美元百万富翁，每天超过 1000 人。【原文：Wealth grew disproportionately quickly last year in the United States, where over 379,000 people became new U.S. dollar millionaires, more than a 1,000 a day, a report published on Wednesday showed.】

item.title: 独家报道蒂森克虏伯副董事长因 "根本不信任 "将投票反对新首席执行官合同
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯副董事长将在周五的董事会上投票反对首席执行官米格尔-洛佩斯的续约，称他在将股份出售给亿万富翁丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基后，没有兑现钢铁部门扭亏为盈的承诺。【原文：Thyssenkrupp's deputy chairman will vote against the contract extension of CEO Miguel Lopez at a board meeting on Friday, saying he had not delivered a promised turnaround of the steel unit after selling a stake to billionaire Daniel Kretinsky.】

item.title: 欧盟接受阿里巴巴抓取非法网络产品的承诺
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三表示，已接受阿里巴巴旗下阿里速卖通（AliExpress）做出的承诺，以解决通过其平台传播潜在非法和淫秽材料的问题。【原文：The European Commission on Wednesday said it had accepted commitments made by Alibaba's AliExpress to address concerns over the dissemination of potentially illegal and pronographic materials through its platform.】

item.title: 俄罗斯储蓄银行计划推出具有推理能力的 LLM
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的银行 Sberbank 第一副首席执行官 Alexander Vedyakhin 在接受路透社采访时表示，该公司计划推出具有推理能力的 Gigachat 大型语言模型 (LLM) 版本。【原文：Russia's largest lender, Sberbank, plans to unveil a version of its Gigachat large language model (LLM) with reasoning capabilities, First Deputy CEO Alexander Vedyakhin told Reuters in an interview.】

item.title: 独家报道俄罗斯储蓄银行警告经济过热，称关键利率低于 15%将刺激经济增长
item.description: 俄罗斯最大的银行 Sberbank 第一副首席执行官 Alexander Vedyakhin 在接受路透社采访时表示，由于利率过高，俄罗斯经济可能会过度降温，并可能难以回到增长轨道。【原文：The Russian economy could cool down excessively due to high interest rates and may face difficulties returning to a growth path, Alexander Vedyakhin, First Deputy CEO of Russia's largest lender, Sberbank, said in an interview with Reuters.】

item.title: 中国将在 STAR Market 上设立板块，接纳盈利前成长型企业
item.description: 中国证券监管机构周三宣布，计划在上海科技股市场（STAR）设立一个新的板块，以接纳盈利前的成长型公司。【原文：China's securities regulator announced plans on Wednesday to set up a new segment on Shanghai's tech-heavy STAR market to host pre-profit growth companies.】

item.title: 亚航首席执行官称，亚航所有者寻求喷气机促进增长，但重组是首要任务
item.description: 亚航所有者Capital A集团的首席执行官、航空企业家托尼-费尔南德斯（Tony Fernandes）周三表示，他正在洽谈购买50至70架空客A321XLR喷气式客机，但表示当务之急是完成集团重组。【原文：Airline entrepreneur Tony Fernandes, CEO of AirAsia owner Capital A Group , said on Wednesday he is in talks to buy 50 to 70 Airbus A321XLR jetliners, but signalled the first priority was to complete the group's restructuring.】

item.title: 希腊零售商敦促欧盟提前征收低价值包裹费
item.description: 路透社看到的一封信显示，希腊零售商希望欧盟提前对进入欧盟的低价值电子商务包裹征收 2 欧元（2.30 美元）的手续费。【原文：Greek retailers want the European Union to bring forward the introduction of a two euro ($2.30) handling fee for low-value e-commerce packages coming into the bloc, a letter, seen by Reuters, showed.】

item.title: 法国工会与雇主将于下周举行最后一次养老金谈判
item.description: 法国工会和雇主将于下周举行最后一次谈判，商讨 2023 年养老金改革方案，但至少有一个主要参与方不确定是否会加入谈判。【原文：French unions and employers negotiating changes to a 2023 pension reform are set to hold last-ditch talks next week, even as at least one major participant was not sure if it would join.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，本田公司将因制动踏板问题召回超过25.9万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，本田汽车公司（Honda Motor）将在美国召回259,033辆汽车，原因是这些汽车的制动踏板存在故障，可能会偏离位置并妨碍制动，从而增加撞车或受伤的风险。【原文：Honda Motor is recalling 259,033 vehicles in the U.S. due to a faulty brake pedal that can shift out of position and hinder braking, raising the risk of crashes or injury, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 能源巨头锁定东南亚，争夺更多天然气以满足人工智能电力需求
item.description: 能源巨头正在马来西亚和印度尼西亚投入天然气勘探和生产，以满足该地区人口增长和数据中心激增带来的电力需求。【原文：Energy majors are pouring money into gas exploration and production in Malaysia and Indonesia to meet rising power demand from growing populations and a proliferation of data centres in the region.】

item.title: 韩国央行行长称不反对基于韩元的稳定币，但有外汇方面的担忧
item.description: 韩国央行行长周三表示，他不反对发行韩元计价的稳定币，但对管理资本流动感到担忧。【原文：South Korea's central bank governor said on Wednesday he was not against issuing won-denominated stablecoins but had concerns about managing capital flows.】

item.title: 德国 PBB 公司在结束美国业务时撤回指导意见
item.description: 德国最大的房地产金融机构之一--德国储蓄银行（Deutsche Pfandbriefbank）周三表示，由于终止在美国的业务产生了特殊支出，该行将撤回全年业绩指引。【原文：Deutsche Pfandbriefbank , one of Germany's top property financiers, said on Wednesday that it was withdrawing its full year guidance amid extraordinary expenses from discontinuing its business in the United States.】
